attributes.action: Recall parliament now! MP's must sort the referendum chaos! Not go on holiday.
attributes.background: MP's are responsible for the chaos that the referendum has created. Instead of going on an extended holiday they should be back at work sorting it out. The country needs leadership and the situation stabilized not a political vacuum.

rejection.details:
Parliament is not currently in recess. You might like to sign this petition instead:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/133517
